statements: DELETE FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE company_id = 5 AND report_date = '2022-01-15'
DELETE FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE report_id = 100 AND company_id = 1;
DELETE FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE energy_consumption > 1000 AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE company_name = 'ABC Energy';
DELETE FROM energy_audit_progress WHERE progress_date < '2022-01-01' AND reduction_percentage > 10.0;
DELETE FROM audit_data WHERE report_id = 100 AND energy_type = 'Electricity';
DELETE FROM audit_details WHERE audit_type = 'Internal Audit';
DELETE FROM audit_details WHERE audit_id IN (SELECT audit_id FROM energy_audit_reports WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp');
